document.docAuthor: El-Hawagry, Magdi S. & Al Dhafer, Hathal M.
document.masterDocTitle: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The family Bombyliidae in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia (Diptera: Brachycera: Asiloidea)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anastoechus
Osten Sacken, 1877 : 251
. Type species:
Anastoechus barbatus Osten Sacken, 1877
, by monotypy.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks:
Anastoechus
spp. known as egg-predators of Acrididae and prey on other predators in egg-pods ( Hull 1973 ; Yeates & Greathead 1997 ).

bibRefCitation.author: Becker, T.
bibRefCitation.refString: Becker, T. (1915) Dipteren aus Tunis in der Sammlung des Ungarischen National-Museums. Annales Historico-Naturales Musei Nationalis Hungarici, 13, 301 - 330.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anastoechus bahirae
Becker, 1915 : 326
. Type locality: Tunisia .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Kenya , Sudan . PA: Algeria , Egypt , Israel , Libya , Saudi Arabia , Spain , Syria , Tunisia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Haiel: Al-Haleifa, Jabel Aja’ (Haiel Gov.), Moqaq (Moqaq Gov.). Riyadh : Al-Ghat (Al- Ghat Gov.).
Dates of collection: March to May.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bombylius exalbidus Wiedemann in
Meigen, 1820 : 215
. Type locality: Portugal .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Oman , Sudan , Yemen . PA: Algeria , Armenia , Azerbaijan , Egypt , France , Gruzia , Israel , Italy , Jordan , Kuwait , Lebanon , Portugal , Saudi Arabia , Spain , Syria , Tunisia , former Yugoslavia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Qasim : Bureida City (Bureida Gov.). Haiel: Haiel City, 25 km SE of Haiel City, 40 km W of Haiel City (Haiel Gov.), Moqaq (Moqaq Gov.).
Dates of collection: March and April.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bombylius nivifrons
Walker, 1871 : 271
. Type locality: Egypt .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Oman , Saudi Arabia [as “South western part”], Sudan , United Arab Emirates , Yemen . OR:? Pakistan . PA: Egypt , Iran , Iraq , Israel , Jordan , Kuwait , Lebanon , Palestine ( West Bank ), Qatar , Saudi Arabia , Syria .

Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Qasim : Bureida City (Bureida Gov.). Al-Sharqiya: Zahran (Zahran Gov.). Asir : Muhaiel (Muhaiel Gov.). Haiel: Haiel City (Haiel Gov.). Makkah : Aqaba (Taief Gov.), nr. Makkah ( Makkah Gov.),
Dates of collection: April and May.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Bombylius stramineus Wiedemann in
Meigen, 1820 : 215
. Type locality: Portugal .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Sudan . PA: Algeria , Egypt , France , Israel , Italy , Libya , Portugal , Saudi Arabia , Spain , Tunisia , Turkmenistan .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Madina: Al-Henakiya (Al-Henakiya Gov.). Haiel: Al-Nefud (Haiel Gov.).
Dates of collection: February and March.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Systoechus trisignatus
Portschinsky, 1881 : 136
. Type locality: Armenia .

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution: AF: Egypt [as ”Gebel Elba”], Oman , Saudi Arabia [South western part], Sudan , Yemen . PA: Algeria , Armenia , Azerbaijan , Bosnia-Herzegovina , Croatia , Egypt , Greece , Gruzia , Israel , Italy , Jordan , Kuwait , Lebanon , Libya , Macedonia , Morocco , Qatar , Saudi Arabia , Slovenia , Syria , Tunisia , former Yugoslavia .
Saudi Arabian localities: Al-Baha : Ghabet Raghdan ( Al-Baha Gov.). Al-Qasim : Bureida City (Bureida Gov.). Asir : Abha City (Abha Gov.). Makkah : Taief City (Taief Gov.).
Dates of collection: April to June.
